channel.title: Hot Spot on GoWi.Fi
channel.description: Recent content in Hot Spot on GoWi.Fi

item.title: GoWi.Fi is the easiest way to access a WI-FI hot spot
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: bgvideo The easiest way to access Wi-Fi With GoWi.Fi, your user's mobile devices will instantly get the Wi-Fi settings configured.-- Buy NOW! GoWi.Fi GoWI.FI is the easiest way to instantly get WI-FI settings configured in your user’s mobile devices. The user doesn’t have to enter any network name (SSID) and password which gives the following advantages: Your staff don’t have to hand out passwords to visitors which saves time Users can’t enter the wrong password You can use very long passwords which are safer You don’t have to use WPS which shouldn’t be used anyway Specification Board size: 74 x 134 x 9 mm Color: white, blue, black, red, yellow, UV-changing (from white to red) Material: PLA plastic, bio degradeble.
